comments:
When i try to open jsp page or xml file i am getting dialog box with "Unable 
to create part:" when i click Ok in the dialog box editor is opening with the 
message "An error has occurred when creating this editor".

I am using eclipse 3.1 M4 version with jsp editor and xml buddy.

It was working earlier good.From yesterday ,it is not working. I do not know 
the reason, i did not install any new software or plugins in my system.
Eclipse did automatic update and installed the new features. after that i am 
getting this problem

thanks
Ganga

Moving to WST for comment. 
I would also recommend trying a more recent build.
Assuming ownership since I see our undo manager in the stack trace. 
The "class not found" part of the bug indicates a bad install ... or maybe 
a "mix" of old (M4) and newer (?) code. 

I do not have XML Buddy installed, but tried several ways 
to re-create but could not. 

If you can re-create on fresh, newer install (with or without 
XML Buddy installed :) 
please reopen
verifying as correctly handled as 'worksforme' if you see again, please open new
bug.
